did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle: Papers of the Dean of Students, University of Virginia 1977-2006
did.physdesc: ca. 5358 items in 23 Hollinger boxes, ca. 10 linear feet

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Access restrictions apply to personally identifiable student records under the terms of the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (F.E.R.P.A.).

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of the Dean of Students, University of Virginia, 1977-2006, #RG-18/2/1.064, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These records were transferred to Special Collections through Rhonda F. Saunders, Office of the Dean of Students, on October 6, 2006.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: These papers consist of the administrative and topical files of the Office of Dean of Student, ca. 5,358 items (23 Hollinger boxes, ca.10 linear feet) 1977-2006.

The papers consist of administrative and topical files pertinent to student life at the University of Virginia. Subjects include the Ernest H. Ern Award; the First Year Resource Center; the Gray-Carrington Award; the Gus Bladgden Committee; the Jefferson Literary and Debating Society; the Lawn Organizing Committee; Orientation; Parents Program funding; the Public Service and Outreach Commission; the Stillfried/Godsey Award; Student Council; the Student Enrollment Services Process Owners' Group; Student Organizations and Programs Steering Committee; substance abuse; University Committee on Public Art; University Committee on Information Technology; Asian American studies; Asian Pacific American Heritage Month; yearly Asian Pacific American Leadership Training Institutes; Asian Prospectives' days; Asian Student Union; Charting Diversity including roundtables and national information; Committee on Asian Cultures; DiAPAson; East Coast Asian American Student Union Conference; Filipino-American National Historical Society; Monroe Society; Peer Advising Family Network; Hurricane Katrina; Kaleidoscope Center; Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual, and Transgender Resource Center; Phi Eta Sigma; Sexual Assault Board; Sexual Assault Judicial Review; student life at peer institutions; and the Peer Advising Family Network.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is arranged in four series, Series I: Papers of the Office of Dean of Students (Boxes 1-5); Series II: Asian/Asian Pacific American Files (Boxes 6-16); Series III: Papers of the Senior Associate Dean of Students Shamim Sisson (Boxes 17-21); and Series IV: Restricted Files (Boxes 22-23).
